## CustomControlProps interface

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomControlProps<T> 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { CustomControlProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disabled](#disabled-property) | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  [invalid](#invalid-property) | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  [isOpen](#isopen-property) | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  [onBlur](#onblur-property) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | onBlur will be automatically passed to custom control closing the menu on element blur |
|  [onClick](#onclick-property) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | onClick will be automatically passed to custom control allowing menu toggle |
|  [ref](#ref-property) | <code>React.Ref&lt;any&gt;</code> |  |
|  [value](#value-property) | <code>SelectableValue&lt;T&gt;</code> | Currently selected value |

```typescript
disabled: boolean;
```

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
invalid: boolean;
```

### isOpen property

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
isOpen: boolean;
```

### onBlur property

onBlur will be automatically passed to custom control closing the menu on element blur

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
onBlur: () => void;
```

### onClick property

onClick will be automatically passed to custom control allowing menu toggle

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
onClick: () => void;
```

### ref property

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
ref: React.Ref<any>;
```
